name: wingfit
description: Wingfit is a self-hosted fitness and workout tracking app. It lets users define routines, record sessions, and view progress over time in a clean web interface optimized for both desktop and mobile devices.
features: Workout logging: Record exercise sessions with exercises, sets, reps, and weights for comprehensive tracking.
Routine builder: Create custom workout routines that can be reused and modified over time.
Progress tracking: Monitor strength gains and performance improvements with charts and statistics.
Exercise library: Access a database of common exercises with instructions and muscle group information.
Session history: Review past workouts to see what you did and how you performed.
Personal records: Track personal bests for each exercise to measure long-term progress.
Rest timer: Built-in timer to manage rest periods between sets and maintain workout intensity.
Mobile responsive: Access your workout data from any device with a responsive web interface.
Data export: Export workout history and statistics for backup or analysis in external tools.
Multi-user support: Allow multiple users to track their individual fitness journeys on one instance.
Custom exercises: Add your own exercises beyond the default library to match your training style.
Body metrics: Log weight, body measurements, and other metrics alongside workout data.
